But lately, she hasn`t been able to control her power, hindering her work on missions. Meanwhile, Ibiki Morino approaches Enko and tells her that she`ll be working under him going forward. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ポテチに負けた心転身の術
The Mind Transfer Jutsu That Lost to Potato Chips
تقنية العقل التي خسرت أمام رقائق البطاطس
Potechi ni Maketa Shintenshin no Jutsu
episode.summary: Inojin approaches his parents about mastering the Mind Transfer Jutsu. Cho-Cho agrees to assist and everything is set for training to begin. With his father Sai observing, Inojin starts training with Ino. But due to his lack of confidence, Inojin`s unable to execute the jutsu, which ends up irritating his mother Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍監獄・鬼灯城
The Shinobi Prison: Hozuki Castle
سجن الشينوبي: قلعة هوزوكي
Shinobi Kangoku: Hoozuki Jou
episode.summary: Hozuki Castle is a prison run by the Hidden Grass, well known for being notoriously difficult to escape from. Boruto and Mitsuki are sent there to protect Kokuri, a former member of a brutal band of robbers known as the Mujina Gang who`s now targeted by assassins after betraying and deserting the gang. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 根性試し
A Test of Willpower
اختبار قوة العزيمة
Konjou Tameshi
episode.summary: Boruto and his team try to get Kokuri assigned to the same cell, but the warden, Benga, shuts the idea down. Looking for a weakness in Benga, they approach Doragu, the leader among the prisoners, for information they can exploit. Doragu is willing to give them information, but in exchange Boruto and the team must undergo a test of perseverance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コクリを狙った犯人
The Criminal Targeting Kokuri
المجرم الذي يستهدف كوكوري
Kokuri o Neratta Hannin
episode.summary: It is discovered that a wooden tag used to prevent unauthorized entry into the medical unit has been stolen, and the prison guards begin a search for the culprit. Until the offender is found, all prisoners are locked in their cells. Once the culprit is found, each of their cellmates will be forced into solitary confinement. If this happens and the team becomes separated from Kokuri, their mission could be jeopardized. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コクリの秘密
Kokuri`s Secret
سر كوكوري
Kokuri no Himitsu
episode.summary: Boruto and the others can`t help but feel that Kokuri is hiding something from them. Meanwhile, Tsukiyo, a lieutenant in the Mujina Gang who`s also imprisoned in Hozuki Castle, schemes to get Kokuri transferred to Hozuki Castle II, where his henchmen lie in wait. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鬼灯城を脱獄せよ
Breaking Out of Hozuki Castle
الهروب من قلعة هوزوكي
Hoozuki Jou o Datsugoku Seyo
episode.summary: Boruto and Mitsuki worry that their mission is in jeopardy, since Kokuri is scheduled to be transferred to Hozuki Castle II. They decide to escape with Kokuri before he`s moved. As they discuss their strategy with Sarada, their cellmate Kedama overhears them Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脱獄, 決行!!
Executing the Prison Break!
تنفيذ الهروب من السجن!
Datsugoku, Kekkou!!
episode.summary: The clock ticks down to the rendezvous time for the escape, but there`s no word from Sarada. If they miss this chance, everything will be ruined. Boruto puts his faith in Sarada and proceeds as planned with Mitsuki and Kokuri. Meanwhile, Sarada`s lost consciousness from falling to the underground level of Hozuki Castle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月下の決戦
The Fateful Moonlit Battle
المعركة المقمرة المقدّرة
Gekka no Kessen
episode.summary: Boruto and the team are waiting for the escape boat when Tsukiyo appears. Boruto and his team fight desperately in order to protect Kokuri, but they`re tormented by Tsukiyo`s jutsu as time threatens to run out on their prison break! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな任務!!
A New Mission!!
مهمّة جديدة!!
Arata na Ninmu!!
episode.summary: Boruto has a dream about the day he defeated Momoshiki Otsutsuki. It ends up bothering him so much that he can`t focus on his mission. He then meets Tento, the son of Ikkyu Madoka—the Feudal Lord of the Land of Fire—who’s in the Hidden Leaf for a meeting with the Hokage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友達...!!
Friends!!
أصدقاء!
Tomodachi...!!
episode.summary: Boruto`s new mission is to guard Tento, who is obsessed with ninja and collecting X Cards. He begs Boruto to teach him ninja skills, and Boruto thinks this will be a good opportunity to knock some sense into Tento. Meanwhile, the Mujina Gang, which had been laying low after Team 7’s infiltration mission at Hozuki Castle, rears its ugly head. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 切り札の価値
The Value of a Hidden Ace
قيمة بطاقة متفوّقة خفيّة
Kirifuda no Kachi
episode.summary: After completing his mission to guard Tento, Boruto is assigned a new B-rank mission with Sarada and Mitsuki. Boruto is excited to start but he finds the rare X Card that he had wanted in his pocket. Realizing that this was from Tento, he goes to their hotel and learns that Tento`s life is in danger. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボルトとテントウ
Boruto and Tento
بوروتو وتينتو
Boruto to Tentou
episode.summary: Boruto rushes to save Tento, but Shojoji the leader of the Mujina Gang blocks his way. Boruto dodges to protect Tento, but Shojoji and his Corpse Clone Jutsu prove to be too powerful. In the midst of all this, the mark on Boruto`s palm reacts and paralyzes him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 医療忍術のすすめ
Developing One`s Medical Ninjutsu
تطوير المرء للنّينجتسو الطبّيّ خاصّته
Iryou Ninjutsu no Susume
episode.summary: A training class on Medical Ninjutsu is to be held, and each team must send a representative. Sarada is chosen for Team 7. Despite Sakura being a Medical Ninjutsu specialist, Sarada doesn`t have a knack for it and being a participant fills her with anxiety. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄金のハーモニー
Harmony in Gold
الانسجام في الذّهب
Ougon no Harmony
episode.summary: Tsubaki, Sumire’s replacement on Team 15, is proud of her samurai upbringing and is highly skilled, but her team’s overall mission performance is lackluster. Tsubaki devises a plan to hone her team’s skills, where they fight for who performs best on missions. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒマワリ, 忍者体験!!
Episode 154
Himawari, Ninja Taiken!!
